resources.string: We only accept cash gifts in person at the church or electronic funds transfers in order to protect the security of your personal information. We regret any inconvenience and are considering more payment methods going forward.
When making a donation, you can specify your offering in the additional remarks field. You can choose from the options general, peace, wave sheaf, burnt, or sin offering.
Please ensure you double check the bank details as we will not be liable if the money gets sent to the wrong account.
100 Christian de Wet Rd, Florida Park, Roodepoort, 2188

Welcome to GraceWell Methodist Church, a welcoming community dedicated to serving others! To begin please: 

1. Select the activity(s) you're interested in. 
2. Name : Enter your full name, this will be used as a method of identifying individuals for contacting purposes 
3. Additional Notes (optional): Feel free to share any preferences, skills, or availability constraints related to the activity. 

Submit your selection, and the respective leaders of the department will contact you soon to provide further instructions and information. 

Join us at GraceWell Methodist Church as we come together to make a positive impact in our community. We appreciate your interest in getting involved, and we look forward to connecting with you soon!

The G-Team is a dedicated group within GraceWell Methodist Church who exemplify the spirit of service and compassion. Comprised of individuals from various age groups and backgrounds, they are driven by a shared commitment to making a positive impact on the community. 


The G-Team actively engage in a wide range of outreach activities, such as volunteering at local homeless shelters, organizing food drives, and participating in community clean-up initiatives. 


They also extend their support to marginalized groups, partnering with organizations to provide educational resources, job training, and mentorship programs.

Songsters is a vibrant and talented musical group within GraceWell Methodist Church. Composed of passionate singers and instrumentalists, they use the power of music to uplift spirits, inspire worship, and deepen the spiritual experience of the congregation. 

Their harmonious melodies and heartfelt performances create an atmosphere of praise and worship during church services, bringing a sense of joy and unity to the community. 

They lead the congregation in hymns, contemporary worship songs, and special musical presentations that touch hearts and invite a deeper connection with God. 

Whether it is through powerful solos, captivating harmonies, or uplifting instrumentals, Songsters adds a melodic dimension to the worship experience, fostering an environment where individuals can encounter the divine through the gift of music.
